data.message:
Everyone forgetting all the shit he said about Bush? 

What's funny is that people are saying "he's lost a fan", you're blatant Trump bummers and if you listened to the end, he's already told you to fuck off.

replies.message:
They don't mention that part. They run and comment. 

"You can't lose me as a fan if I say I'm not supporting you first" lol

What nobody seems to realise is that this is what Eminem wanted. I hope his new album is sick. I didn't rate mm2 but relapse was beginning to end dope. N obviously every album previous to that was pure gold.
Someone from the UK doesn't understand US politics. Bush got us into Iraq, Trump kept us from war with Russia.
I'm meaning he isn't jumping on the band wagon or doing this for publicity or money.

He had to bash Trump after a year of the election, so I think he wasn't too irrelevant and is trying to get irrelevant again to sell his next album. Its working all the media is talking about it Eminem.
I love that Eminem raps what he feels,kill em all Eminem!
He is a bigger idiot for doing that video. Fyi sure he has said f off before but nothing like that video. He is a bigger jerk for further being a hypocrite

You've just proven yourself an idiot. He didn't say "fuck off." He said, "fuck you" and per the first amendment, we have every right to say "fuck you too" after we (my generation of fans) actually spent money for his cd's and didn't just rip them off the internet. 

And I was anti-Bush too, so what?

From what I remember he never told his fans that were also bush supporters to go Fuck themselves. The one thing you neve, ever do as an entertainer is shit on the people that gave you your fame. Especially when, in reality, your just another piece of shit.
kept his mouth shut about obama dropping bombs though didnt he
Elijah Austin Thomas An intolerant piece of shit.
He's a sellout. He talked shit about establishment government but now he li as them. SELLOUT
Stephen Comish  kiss my ass socialist
Let's say only 20% of his fans drop him. No chance for number one.
Easy chance for number 1. Well here in the UK. Maybe not in the US.
Bush was a Globalist.. 911 Inside Job.. you think Eminem would Know.. Obama was a Globalist Traitor.. and Trump Was Elected to end Globalism in this country.. and SAVE AMERICAN SOVEREIGNTY..  but NO!
Don't draw the line then bitch
